page.title: 05NATIONAL ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: IN NEW YORK IN ABOUT 1980,THE PEOPLE WHO WERE OUT OF WORK INVENTED (BREAK DANCING).BODY POPPING WAS THOUGHT OF LATER.IT CAME TO BRITAIN ABOUT 1982 AND THE PERSON WHO STARTED IT ALL OFF OVER WAS MALCOLM MACLAREN WHO CAME FROM NEW YORK BUT WAS LIVING OVER HERE.PEOPLE AT YOUTH CLUBS,EVEN PEOPLE ON THE STREETS BEGAN TO BREAK DANCE.USING SUCH MOVES AS THE WINDMILL,BACK SPINS,CATERPILLARS AND SWIPES. THERE ARE MANY CLASSES WHERE PEOPLE OF ANY AGE CAN LEARN BODY POPPING AND BREAK DANCING.IT IS HARD TO BREAK WITHOUT MUSIC (BUT NOT IMPOSSIBLE).RECORDS INCLUDE ELECTRO 1,2,3,4,5,6 AND 7,{WILD STYLE}WHICH IS A REMIX VERSION OF THE FILM SOUND TRACKS.FILMS INCLUDE{BREAKDANCE 1 AND {2,BEAT STREET}AND {WILD STYLE}.
